whyUs.title: Why choose Physiotherapon?
whyUs.description.html: In the heart of Thessaloniki, Physiotherapon is a pioneering choice in the field of physiotherapy and kinesiotherapy.
whyUs.doctor1.desc: Physiotherapist, graduate of higher education in physiotherapy.
whyUs.doctor2.desc: Highly qualified assistant Physiotherapist with fifteen years of experience.
whyUs.doctor2.allAges: All age groups, athletes & people with disabilities
about.title: About Physiotherapon
about.history.html: Our story began in the summer of 2023, when Stavros Terzanidis (Physiotherapist) and Evangelos Papatheodorou (Assistant Physiotherapist) decided to join forces.
about.ourSpaceDesc: A new physiotherapy centre in Thessaloniki with fully equipped treatment rooms, modern equipment and rehabilitation & kinesiotherapy tools.
quote.text: Let us strengthen your body by designing the ideal treatment and rehabilitation plan for your needs, through modern physiotherapy technologies and the latest kinesiotherapy techniques!
therapies.title: Therapies
therapies.intro: Poor posture, a sedentary lifestyle, competitive sports, paralysis, an accident, a congenital condition, pain in general — there are many reasons that may lead you to a physiotherapist's door.
therapies.box1.html: We believe that taking a thorough medical history, combined with your recent examinations and in collaboration with your orthopedist, are essential steps for the best rehabilitation and recovery plan.
therapies.box2.html: At Physiotherapon, with experience in demanding physiotherapy settings — such as hospitals and sports teams — we work with you towards a daily life that is functional, independent and pain-free.
therapies.item2: Anterior and posterior cruciate ligament rehabilitation
therapies.item4: Shoulder, back and neck injury rehabilitation
therapies.box3Outro: ...and for any other physiotherapy and kinesiotherapy need.
kinesiotherapy.title: Kinesiotherapy
kinesiotherapy.p1.html: At Physiotherapon, we believe that the potential of modern physiotherapy technologies works only when combined with kinesiotherapy.
kinesiotherapy.p2.html: With the right program and exercise plan — based on the needs of your condition — we reach your goal together, effectively. All under the supervision of physiotherapists, in Physiotherapon's specially equipped gym.
gallery.title: Our Space
gallery.p1: Discover the modern facilities of Physiotherapon — four fully equipped physiotherapy rooms and a spacious kinesiotherapy gym.
gallery.p2: Abundant natural light, a friendly environment, minimal aesthetics and curated music — the ideal setting for both patients and physiotherapists.
gallery.p3: Every visit is a pleasure, and physiotherapy is practiced effectively — thanks to the expertise of the physiotherapists and collaboration with the patient.
doctors.terzanidis.name: STAVROS TERZANIDIS
doctors.terzanidis.quote1: ❝Physiotherapon is the culmination of 20 years of experience — a natural evolution of everything we call physiotherapy.
doctors.terzanidis.quote2.html: We created the right conditions so that everyone without exception can effectively recharge their body:
doctors.terzanidis.list2: Elderly people who want to recover after an accident
doctors.papatheodorou.name: EVANGELOS PAPATHEODOROU
doctors.papatheodorou.quote1: ❝At Physiotherapon we gathered all our experience, knowledge and passion for Physiotherapy.
doctors.papatheodorou.quote2: We built from scratch an ultra-modern physiotherapy centre in Thessaloniki, with genuine care for each patient individually.
doctors.papatheodorou.quote3.html: Our goal: with the most suitable program of therapies, rehabilitation & kinesiotherapy, every patient returns effectively & dynamically to their own, unique, daily life!❞
location.title: The Location
location.desc.html: Physiotherapon is the new, modern physiotherapy centre in Thessaloniki. On the first floor of Papafi 125, with easy access in Kato Toumba.
location.bus1: OASTH 12 KTEL – KATO TOUMBA → Stop: KLEANTHOUS
location.parking: Easy temporary parking in the surrounding area.
location.accessibilityDesc: Entrance ramp, large elevator and specially designed spaces — full accessibility for everyone, including the elderly and people with disabilities.
